title: Average weekly working hours in Sweden 2019 , by type of employment
yAxis: Average number of working hours per week
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average number of working hours per week for 4 number of Form of Employments.
The maximum Average number of working hours per week 35.4 is found at Form of Employment Self-employed and the minimum is found at Temporary employed where Form of Employment is 25.5.
There is a difference of 9.9 between the maximum Form of Employment Self-employed and minimum Form of Employment Temporary employed.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Form of Employment, and Average number of working hours per week in each Form of Employment on the y axis.
The Average number of working hours per week is appeared to be the highest at Form of Employment Self-employed and lowest at Form of Employment Temporary employed.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average number of working hours per week for 4 number of Form of Employments.
The maximum Average number of working hours per week 35.4 is found at Form of Employment Self-employed and the minimum is found at Temporary employed where Form of Employment is 25.5.
There is a difference of 9.9 between the maximum Form of Employment Self-employed and minimum Form of Employment Temporary employed.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Form of Employment in the x axis and Average number of working hours per week in the y axis.
The Average number of working hours per week is appeared to be the highest at Form of Employment Self-employed and lowest at Form of Employment Temporary employed.
Form of Employment  has the second highest value for Average number of working hours per week.
The lowest value at Form of Employment Temporary employed is 1.39x times less than the highest value at Self-employed.
The Form of Employment Self-employed has the highest Average number of working hours per week, followed by , and Employed total. Down to the Form of Employment Temporary employed which is the lowest.
The highest value 35.4 at Self-employed is almost 1.17 times larger than the average value 30.38.
Summing up the values of all Form of Employments, we get total 121.5.
